title: IOT TOY
welcomeText:
# Welcome to IOT TOY: Pioneering Smart Living Solutions

Welcome to IOT TOY, where innovation meets imagination, and the future of smart living unfolds. As a leading force in the realm of Internet of Things (IoT), we are dedicated to revolutionizing the way you interact with your environment. Join us on a journey into a world where technology seamlessly enhances your lifestyle.

## About IOT TOY

At IOT TOY, we are more than just a technology company; we are visionaries, engineers, and creators passionate about shaping the future. Our core mission is to empower individuals and communities through the thoughtful integration of technology into everyday life. We believe that technology should not only automate tasks but elevate the overall human experience.

## Visionary Solutions for Modern Living

### Home Automation Redefined

Our expertise in home automation using Arduino and Raspberry Pi is at the forefront of redefining how homes function. Imagine a living space that adapts to your needs, where lights, fans, and appliances respond intelligently to your presence. With IOT TOY, this vision becomes a reality.

### Computer Vision Innovations

Explore the possibilities of computer vision with our FastAPI OpenCV projects. From real-time car tracking to smile detection, we lead the way in leveraging cutting-edge technologies to create intuitive and intelligent solutions.

### Machine Learning for Real Estate

Step into the future of real estate with our machine learning prowess. Our Real Estate Price Predictor, equipped with Streamlit UI, provides accurate predictions and visualizations, making property decisions smarter and more informed.

### Robotics and Beyond

Discover the excitement of robotics with our path-retracing robot using Arduino, navigating spaces with precision. Dive into the world of IoT with an edge device utilizing ESP32, connecting sensors for data analysis and visualization.

## Your Journey Starts Here

Whether you're a tech enthusiast, homeowner, or business looking to embrace innovation, IOT TOY has something for you. Explore our diverse portfolio, join us on the path to smart living, and be part of a connected future.

## Get in Touch

Ready to embark on a journey into smart living? Contact us to discuss partnership opportunities, custom projects, or to share your ideas. The future is now, and IOT TOY is here to guide you into a world of possibilities.

[Contact Us](#) | [Explore Our Projects](https://project-recipe.netlify.app/blog) | [About Us](https://project-recipe.netlify.app/about)
